text: The Many is a 2016 novel by Wyl Menmuir. It follows the story of Timothy, a foreigner who buys an abandoned house in a coastal village.http://themanbookerprize.com/books/many-by-wyl-menmuir The book was longlisted for the 2016 Man Booker Prize. ==Awards and honors== *2016 Man Booker Prize, longlistee. ==References== Category:2016 British novels
title: The Many (novel)
